text:
Are you OK? Are you OK? Yes, yes, oh, hey…
Hello, hello, hello! How are you? Are you

happy? Sad? Or OK? I am OK! I am OK, OK, OK!
Say it with me… OK, OK, OK! Well done!

Hey, if you´re OK, you say yes, I am. So,
are you OK? Yes, I am. Are you OK? Yes, I

am! And again. Are you OK? Yes, I am.
Well done! Oh look, there is a playground.

Come on, let´s play! Oh, wow, look! A swing!
I am more than OK now, I am happy. Happy,

happy, happy! Yeah!
Oh, hey, listen. What´s that noise? Oh, no!

Au! My bottom! Au! I am not happy now! No,
no, no! I am sad! Are you sad?

Maggie: Hey, hello Steve!
Steve: Hello Maggie.

Maggie: Why are you so sad?
Steve: Because my swing is broken and I´ve

hurt my bottom. Au!
Maggie: Oh, no! Time for some Maggie Magic!

Maggie: Maggie Magic!
Steve: I am happy again. Happy, happy, happy!
